itunes:title: Spontaneous Conversations on Contentment
title: Spontaneous Conversations on Contentment
description:
How DOES a homemaker have a heart that's content?   Join us for an unplanned conversation where we hash out ideas on contentment, thankfulness, and happiness even in the midst of needing new washing machines or nursing a sick child.   CAN we be content when the modern message is that 'happiness' is just one more purchase away?   We're working through our thoughts most spontaneously today.  Warning:  there will be some faith, some laughter and some tears.

Join us on Patreon at www.patreon.com/homemakerchicpodcast.   Get free digital copies of our cookbooks, our printable #pitlist, join the Discord call AND the monthly homemaker live stream party when you become a patron of the podcast!

Jovial Foods. Jovial Foods is a company that supplies us homemakers with the most gorgeous baking flours and foods. Jovial is most well known for their einkorn flour, which is a high-protein, weak gluten flour that bakes up buttery and rich. This flour will make your homemade scones, breads, pies, and cakes taste so much better!  Free shipping too!

American Blossom Linens  - American Blossom Linens is the bedding that both Shaye and I sleep on and so do many of our listeners.   We LOVE our modern vintage sheets made from Texas-grown cotton… no dyes, no imported fabrics here -  Turn your bedroom into an organic, chic oasis by using the promo code HOMEMAKERCHIC20, and get an exclusive 20% off discount just for listening to the show. www.Americanblossomlinens.com

CUE THE WINE MUSIC! Today’s “What We’re Sipping” segment is brought to you by Dry Farm Wines. Dry Farms is an online wine subscription that pairs organic, biodynamic, naturally yeasted, low-sugar, lower-alcohol wines from all over the world. As Dry Farm customers, we get to share in their love for organic, naturally and traditionally made wines.  “better, not more.” So check out their better wines. You can get either 3,6 or 12 bottles delivered to your door monthly.
Drink Dry Farm Wines with Ang and Shaye!   Shop and Sip at:  https://bit.ly/ ryFarmWinewithHomemakerChic
